actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for conveyance of certain lands adjacent to the Gund Ranch, Grass Valley, Nev., to the University of Nevada.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey specified lands of the United States which are adjacent to the Gund Ranch, Grass Valley, Nevada, to the University of Nevada.

titles.title: A bill to provide for conveyance of certain lands adjacent to the Gund Ranch, Grass Valley, Nev., to the University of Nevada.
